price: „Јеси ли ти урадио ово са нашим боговима, о Авраме?“ Упиташе.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلۡتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū a-anta faʿalta hādhā biālihatinā yāib'rāhīmu
